x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
with Current job market scenario, Despite being graduated from good colleges with good scores, freshers often find it had to get placed.
Fresh graduates and entry-level candidates often struggle to find suitable job opportunities despite being qualified and eager to start their careers. The main challenges they face include:
Fragmented job information — listings are scattered across multiple platforms (LinkedIn, Naukri, company career pages and other Job portals)
Lack of real-time updates on mass hiring events, walk-ins, and off-campus drives.
No centralized platform that aggregates all fresher-friendly jobs and hiring drives in one place.
As a result, many talented students miss out on opportunities due to poor access
